oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Vols versus Little Rock Travelers at Sulphur Dell, 1957 June 30
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from the June 30th, 1957 baseball game of the Nashville Vols versus Little Rock Travelers, both teams of the Southern Association. This game was played in the historic ballpark called Sulphur Dell, located in north Nashville near downtown. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Vols (Baseball team); Little Rock Travelers (Baseball team)
